cardActionPerformance(Options) - Method in class Model.Rules.SevenoRules
Performs the classic actions associated with the Card, adding the action of the 7 and 0 Card:
- with a 7, the current Player chooses a player to swap hands with; - with a 0, the players swap their hand with the next player following the direction of the turn.

CLASSIC_RULES - Enum constant in enum class Controller.GameChoiceController.GameMode
 
CLASSIC_RULES_CARD_DISTRIBUTION - Static variable in class Model.DeckManager
Classic card distrbution of Uno
108 cards distributed so: 4 Cards Wild 4 Cards Wild Draw Then for each color: 1 Zero Card 2 Cards for each value from 1 to 9 2 Cards draw 2 Cards skip 2 Cards reverse
ClassicRules - Class in Model.Rules
This class specializes UnoGameRules to provide the methods of the classic game mode of UNO
Classic deck composition of Uno
108 cards distributed so: 4 Cards Wild 4 Cards Wild Draw Then for each color: 1 Zero Card 2 Cards for each value from 1 to 9 2 Cards draw 2 Cards skip 2 Cards reverse
ClassicRules() - Constructor for class Model.Rules.ClassicRules
Creates a new ClassicRules with the classic cards per player, cards playable and deck composition

Color - Enum Class in Model.Cards
All the colors of a Uno Card,
colors are thought to be comparable,
and the order goes top-down like this: RED YELLOW GREEN BLUE WILD
